name: Gjen Specter I
ability: This unit does not count against capacity. Up to 2 of this unit can be transported on each non-fighter ship.

name: Gjen Specter II
ability:
This unit does not count against capacity. Up to 4 of this unit can be transported on each non-fighter ship.
At the start of a space combat, you may remove up to 3 infantry from the space area of the active system. For each 1 that you remove, your opponent must assign 1 hit to their ships.

name: Qanik Revenant
ability: DEPLOY: After another player commits ground forces to a planet you control, you may spend 3 resources to place 1 mech on 1 planet you control in the active system

name: Draugr och Hoenir
ability: When you move this ship into a system that contains a frontier token, you may explore that token.

name: Apparition
ability: DEPLOY: During the commit ground forces step of your tactical action in a system that contains your ships, if you have no ground forces in the active system, you may spend 2 resources to place 1 mech on 1 planet in the system.

name: Infantry II
ability: You may produce 1 additional infantry for their cost. These infantry do not count against your PRODUCTION limit.

name: Spec Ops II
ability: You may produce 1 additional infantry for their cost. These infantry do not count against your PRODUCTION limit.

name: Crimson Legionnaire II
ability:
After this unit is destroyed, gain 1 commodity or convert 1 of your commodities to a trade good.
You may produce 1 additional infantry for their cost. These infantry do not count against your PRODUCTION limit.

name: Space Dock II
ability:
This unit's PRODUCTION value is equal to 5 more than the resource value of this planet.
Up to 6 fighters in this system do not count against your ships' capacity.

name: War Sun
ability: Other players' units in this system lose PLANETARY SHIELD.

name: War Sun
ability:
Other players units' in this system lose PLANETARY SHIELD ability.
